Detailed Description

Setup session variables see CoreState.

Function Documentation

blueLine ( $  row  ) 

Get member information line for a given member

Parameters:
$row a record from custdata
Returns:
string
Deprecated:
Just define blueLine in custdata.

customreceipt (  ) 

Fetch text fields from the customReceipt table These fields are used for various messages that invariably must be customized at every store.

initiate_session (  ) 

Populates $CORE_LOCAL with default values. Short-hand for calling every other function in this file. Normally called once on startup.

loaddata (  ) 

If there are records in localtemptrans, get the member number and initialize $CORE_LOCAL member variables.

The only time this function does anything is in crash recovery - if a browser is closed and re-opened or the computer is rebooted in the middle of a transaction.

memberReset (  ) 

Initialize member related variables in $CORE_LOCAL. This function is called after the end of every transaction.

printReset (  ) 

Initialize print related variables in $CORE_LOCAL. This function is called after the end of every transaction.

system_init (  ) 

Initialize system default values in $CORE_LOCAL. Variables defined here should always exist but won't be reset to these values on a regular basis.

transReset (  ) 

Initialize transaction variable in $CORE_LOCAL. This function is called after the end of every transaction so these values will be the the defaults every time.
